name: Shooting Star
description:
After your character uses a Skill: Accumulate 1 Night Star. If you have at least 4 Night Stars, consume 4 Night Stars and deal 1 Cryo DMG. (The Skill that causes this Combat Status will also trigger this effect)
When causing this Combat Status again: Accumulate 2 Night Stars.
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After your character uses a Skill:</color> Accumulate 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Night Star</color>. If you have at least 4 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Night Stars</color>, consume 4 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Night Stars</color> and deal 1 $[K101]. (The Skill that causes this Combat Status will also trigger this effect)\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>When causing this Combat Status again:</color> Accumulate 2 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Night Stars</color>.

If you have at least 4 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Night Stars</color>, consume 4 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Night Stars</color> and deal 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#2101}<color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo DMG</color>. (The Skill that causes this Combat Status will also trigger this effect)\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>When causing this Combat Status again:</color> Accumulate 2 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Night Stars</color>.
